content: {"locationId": "11746", "organizationId": "9235", "name": "Chester-Andover Family Center", "address1": "908 Route 103 South", "address2": "", "city": "Chester", "state": "VT", "zipCode": "05143", "country": null, "phone": "802-875-3236", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://chester-andoverfamilycenter.org", "latitude": "43.2513064", "longitude": "-72.577578", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "TOWNSHIP/NEIGHBORHOOD:  Andover, Chester, TOWNSHIP/NEIGHBORHOOD:  Chester and Andover", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Chester-Andover Family Center (CAFC) serves our community with three services: A Thrift Shop, A Food Shelf and Financial Assistance.
